name: Hallows Deed -Chapter one
description:
HALLOW'S DEED

This is my first game to ever be released online, amounting of more than a year of work started on 28th of january 2021.

Hallow's deed is a single player story driven game where you uncover the mysteries of the Afterworld as you try to find your way to the land of the living. 

In order to proceed in your real time combat adventure you will have to use the powers of transformation into Afterworld creatures seeking to solve puzzles and fight your way to the tyranical entity that rules this plane of existence.

Hear about future updates on my twitter: https://twitter.com/TTenebris.
